column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Came here as a last minute decision bc Seasons 52 had an hour wait and it was the best decision! We had a ladies night out for quick drinks and appetizers before an event so we were on a time crunch and we were in and out within an hour on a Friday night! Amazing food and service! Our waitress Jaclyn was awesome and the servers as well were extremely friendly
column3: and treated us amazingly! Atmosphere was great and food was good too! We enjoyed the chicken Bourbon flatbread
column4: pulled pork hush puppies and parmesan crusted meatloaf. Would highly recommend and will definitely go back because we enjoyed it!
